UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Two short antimicrobial peptides derived from prosaposin-like proteins in the starry flounder (Platichthys stellatus)
Literature.Author: Choi K-M, Hwang SD, Joo M-S, Hwang JY, Kwon M-G, Jeong J-M, Seo JS, Lee JH, Lee H-C, Park C-I

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Streptococcus iniae FP5228(MIC=62.5-125µg/ml),Streptococcus parauberis KSP 28(MIC=>500µg/ml),Streptococcus parauberis PH0710(MIC=250-500µg/ml),Edwardsiella piscicida FSW 910410(MIC=>500µg/ml),Vibrio alginolyticus KCCM 2928(MIC=>500µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum TR14001NF(MIC=>500µg/ml),Vibrio campbellii KCCM 40684(MIC=>500µg/ml),Vibrio harveyi ATCC 14126(MIC=62.5-125µg/ml),Vibrio ordalii KCCM 41669(MIC=>500µg/ml),Miamiensis avidus(70-80% Killing=125µg/ml),Miamiensis avidus(80-90% Killing=250µg/ml)
